item.title: Bypassing Chrome’s Anti-XSS Filter，绕过谷歌浏览器 XSS 过滤器
item.description: Hi! Just wanted to share my finding. I’ve found a way to bypass Chrome’s anti-xss filter. This bypass is universal, and it defeats Chrome’s XSSAuditor in all cases! Description XSS attacks occur when one website injects JavaScript code into otherwise legitimate requests to another website. The injected script generally attempts to access privileged
